name: The Oregon Trail

files.game: N/A:Select the game's archive file you downloaded from www.myabandonware.com

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the game's archive file you downloaded from www.myabandonware.com
game:
  config_file: dosbox_oregondx.conf
  main_file: oregondlx/OREGON.EXE
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: game
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_oregondx.conf
    key: cycles
    section: cpu
    value: max
